      • answerSurvey

        public void answerSurvey​(java.lang.String path)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Answers a previously exported survey

        Defines the current AnswerValidator.customer and validates the grammar

        Parameters:
        path - Path to the exported survey file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown by AnswerValidator.validate

                              throws java.io.IOException
        Exports a given survey to text file.
        Parameters:
        option - Index of the survey list
        Returns:
        Path to the generated file
        Throws:

      • getRepeatabilityItems

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRepeatabilityItems​(Repeatability repeatability)
        Gets the List of items to repeat the sections.

        Used to export the survey.
        Finds all the supported types and stores their names

        Parameters:
        repeatability - Given Section repeatability, stores all codes
        Returns:
        List with all the Objects' names

      • findQuestionnaire

        public Questionnaire findQuestionnaire​(Survey survey,
                                       java.lang.String code)
        Finds the Questionnaire associated to a given survey

        Compare if the provided code is the same associated to the survey

        Parameters:
        survey - Survey associated to a questionnaire
        code - Questionnaire Code to compare
        Returns:
        Instance of Questionnaire associated to a survey if found, else returns null

      • findSection

        public Section findSection​(Questionnaire questionnaire,
                           java.lang.String code)
        Finds a Section within a Questionnaire by a code

        Searches all the sections available in the Questionnaire and compare its code

        Parameters:
        questionnaire - Questionnaire to use in the search
        code - Section Code to compare
        Returns:
        Instance of Section associated to the questionnaire if found, else return null

        Parameters:

        code - Question Code to compare
        Returns:

        Cretes a new instance of Answer and stores it in the repository
        Parameters:

        section - Section being answered
        question - Question being answered.
